benchmark_details.name: ChatPD: An LLM-driven Paper-Dataset Networking System
benchmark_details.overview: ChatPD is a system that utilizes Large Language Models to automate dataset information extraction from academic papers and construct a structured paper-dataset network, facilitating dataset discovery and recommendations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To automate the extraction of dataset information from academic papers and construct a structured paper-dataset network for dataset discovery.

data.source: Papers collected from arXiv (cs.AI) between 2018 to 2024
data.size: 60,126 papers, 4,224 dataset entities, 137,004 paper-dataset usage records

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the accuracy of extracted dataset information and entity resolution.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision and recall indicate better ability to accurately extract dataset information.
methodology.validation: Evaluation based on manually annotated dataset usage in academic papers
